title: Catchpoint
extract: Definition of catch point. i. One of a set of spring-loaded points in an upgrade railway line that close behind a rising train. If any rolling stock breaks away it is then automatically diverted to a siding. Ref: Pryor, 3.
extract_html: Definition of catch point. i. One of a set of spring-loaded points in an upgrade railway line that close behind a rising train. If any rolling stock breaks away it is then automatically diverted to a siding. Ref: Pryor, 3.
